natural_language_example: An airline company needs to assign planes to flights and route them to carry passengers between cities at minimum cost. There are 3 cities, 2 types of planes, and 2 time periods. Each plane type has a specific capacity and cost. The goal is to minimize the total cost while ensuring that all passenger demands are met, the number of planes used does not exceed the available fleet, and the flow of planes between cities and periods is balanced.
